name: CreativeItemStackHelper
description: The `CreativeItemStackHelper` class is an extension of `ItemStackHelper` that provides methods for modifying items as if they were in creative mode. This class is specifically designed for manipulating item properties that would typically require creative mode access, such as enchantments, custom names, durability, lore, and other NBT-related modifications.
overview:
This class is ideal for:
- Creating custom items with specific properties
- Modifying existing items with creative-like powers
- Adding enchantments and custom lore
- Setting item properties not normally editable in survival mode

methods.name: setDamage
methods.description: Sets the damage value of the item.

parameters.name: damage
parameters.description: The amount of damage to apply to the item

methods.name: setDurability
methods.description: Sets the current durability of the item.

methods.name: setCount
methods.description: Sets the number of items in the stack.
examples:
let items = Registry.createItemStack("minecraft:diamond")
    .setCount(64); // Create a full stack of diamonds

methods.name: setName
methods.description: Sets the custom display name of the item.

methods.name: addEnchantment
methods.description: Adds an enchantment to the item.

methods.name: addEnchantment
methods.description: Adds an enchantment using an EnchantmentHelper object.

methods.name: clearEnchantments
methods.description: Removes all enchantments from the item.
examples:
let cleanItem = Player.getMainHand().getCreative()
    .clearEnchantments(); // Remove all enchantments

methods.name: removeEnchantment
methods.description: Removes a specific enchantment from the item.

methods.name: removeEnchantment
methods.description: Removes a specific enchantment using an EnchantmentHelper object.

methods.name: clearLore
methods.description: Removes all lore from the item.
examples:
let cleanItem = Player.getMainHand().getCreative()
    .clearLore(); // Clear all description lines

methods.name: setUnbreakable
methods.description: Makes the item unbreakable or removes the unbreakable flag.

parameters.name: unbreakable
parameters.description: Whether the item should be unbreakable

examples:
let foreverTool = Registry.createItemStack("minecraft:diamond_pickaxe")
    .setUnbreakable(true); // Make it never break

methods.name: hideEnchantments
methods.description: Controls whether enchantments are shown in the tooltip.

methods.name: hideModifiers
methods.description: Controls whether attribute modifiers are shown in the tooltip.

methods.name: hideUnbreakable
methods.description: Controls whether the unbreakable flag is shown in the tooltip.

parameters.name: hide
parameters.description: Whether to hide the unbreakable flag

methods.name: hideCanDestroy
methods.description: Controls whether the "Can Destroy" information is shown in the tooltip.

parameters.name: hide
parameters.description: Whether to hide can destroy info

methods.name: hideCanPlace
methods.description: Controls whether the "Can Place On" information is shown in the tooltip.

parameters.name: hide
parameters.description: Whether to hide can place on info

methods.name: hideDye
methods.description: Controls whether the dye color of leather armor is shown in the tooltip.
